description: Detroit-themed t-shirt is a great gift for any occasion: Birthday, Christmas, Father's or Mother's Day gift, Thanksgiving, Valentines Day, Anniversary or just to treat yourself to a great graphic tee and show off your Detroit Pride and Detroit Roots.

Detroit Rebels clothing brand was created as a hip, urban clothing line meant to show off love to Detroit. All our designs foster dedication and commitment to Detroit and its great citizens. Prints and images are influenced by Detroit's retro, vintage styles, as well as city's history, Detroit landmarks, music, and sports great memories. That's why our tee shirts have that truly unique and 100% Detroitish look and feel.

Every shirt undergoes a quality check before it is shipped to you but if you find any fault in stitching or design plz let us know. We will replace your shirt as soon as possible. Even if you are not satisfied with our product for any reason you can claim your return within 15 days of delivery.
